title: Senate Confirms Chris Magnus to Head U.S. Customs and Border Protection
sub_head: Tucson, Ariz., police chief will take over border agency as Biden administration copes with high levels of illegal immigration
body:
WASHINGTON—Chris Magnus, the police chief in Tucson, Ariz., who became a vocal critic of former President Donald Trump’s immigration policies, was confirmed as the commissioner of U.S. Customs and Border Protection on Tuesday.
The Senate confirmed Mr. Magnus with a narrow margin, on a 50-47 vote.
